title: Flipped Learning-Based Science Curriculum Chatbot Utilization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theories and flipped learning experience
context.additional_context: Students interact with chatbots using personal smartphones/tablets and engage in discussions and project-based activities during offline classes

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain key scientific concepts at 80% or higher accuracy through interactions with a chatbot in three types (knowledge exploration, case analysis, and literature guidance).
Learners can increase self-directed learning time by 20% or more by applying chatbot utilization strategies in a flipped learning environment.
Learners can propose creative approaches at least three times when solving scientific project problems based on chatbot interaction experiences.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
